FuncDef:
The pki validate ocsp-server-certificate enable command enables the function that uses the OCSP server certificate to verify OCSP server packets.
The undo pki validate ocsp-server-certificate enable command disables the function that uses the OCSP server certificate to verify OCSP server packets. The pki validate ocsp-server-certificate enable command enables the function that uses the OCSP server certificate to verify OCSP server packets. The undo pki validate ocsp-server-certificate enable command disables the function that uses the OCSP server certificate to verify OCSP server packets. By default, the function that uses the OCSP server certificate to verify OCSP server packets is enabled.
ExtraInfo: For security purposes, you are advised to enable the function that uses the OCSP server certificate to verify OCSP server packets. If OCSP server packets fail the verification, the device discards these packets.
